tenses.name: Simple Present
examples: I eat breakfast every day.
She speaks English fluently.

tenses.name: Present Continuous
examples: They are playing football right now.
I am studying for my exams.

tenses.name: Simple Past
examples: He visited his grandparents last weekend.
We went to the beach yesterday.

tenses.name: Past Continuous
examples: She was reading a book while waiting for the bus.
They were watching a movie at that time.

tenses.name: Present Perfect
examples: I have visited Paris twice.
She has already seen that movie.

tenses.name: Present Perfect Continuous
examples: They have been studying English for three years.
We have been working hard on this project.

tenses.name: Simple Future
examples: He will call you later.
We shall meet at the restaurant.

tenses.name: Future Continuous
examples: She will be swimming at the pool tomorrow.
They will be traveling to Europe next month.

tenses.name: Future Perfect
examples: He will have finished his work by tonight.
We shall have completed the project by next week.

tenses.name: Future Perfect Continuous
examples: They will have been waiting for hours when we arrive.
I shall have been practicing the piano for a long time by then.
